pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, February 10, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, February 10, 2018:

Note: All times local

Los Angeles, California

8:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a brief joint media availability with the Mayor of Los Angeles, Eric Garcetti.

Griffith Observatory
2800 E. Observatory Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media must arrive no later than 6:30 a.m.
  • All media must RSVP to cate.hurley@lacity.org by 3 p.m., Friday, February 9. As space is limited for this press availability, not all media that RSVP will be granted credentials. Invited media will receive email notification and detailed instructions by 5 p.m., Friday, February 9.
